summary: A gang of pickpockets roam the streets of Hong Kong.
cast: Simon Yam|Kelly Lin|Ka Tung Lam|Hoi-Pang Lo|Wing-Cheong Law|Moon-Yuen Cheung|Suet Lam|Chun-Shun Lo|Jonathan Yat-Sing Lee|Jackson Ha|Jeff Cheung|Wai Leung Hung|Yee-Yee Yeung|Chiang Lo|Chi-Ping Chang|Pui Chung Tong|Tiffany Wu|Charis Chung|Tai Wo Tang|Manjit Singh|Ernst Mausser|Courtney Wu
title: Man jeuk
